typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) view external returns (struct CharacterDetail memory)
function (uint256) view external returns (struct CharacterDetail memory)
function (uint256) view external returns (struct CharacterDetail memory)
function (uint256) view external returns (struct CharacterDetail memory)
function (uint256) view external returns (struct CharacterDetail memory)
function (uint256) view external returns (struct CharacterDetail memory)

getRoleAdmin(uint256).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(uint256,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

renounceRole(uint256,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

revokeRole(uint256,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.
